attributes.action: ALLOW THE RED ARROWS TO FLY AT THE 2012 OLYMPICS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE ARE BRITISH   THE RED ARROWS REPRESENT BRITAIN AND AS SUCH SINCE WE STAGING THE 2012 OLYMPICS SHOULD BE ALLOWED TO FLY OVER THE GAMES IN FORMATION  IT WILL BE A WONDERFUL SITE THEY ARE ONLY BRITISH PLANES FOR GOODNESS SAKE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
